actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the placement of a plaque in the Hessville Post Office, Hammond, Indiana, in memory of the late Fred W. Dedelow.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to provide for the placement of a plaque in memory of Fred W. Dedelow in the Hessville Post Office Building, Hammond, Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the placement of a plaque in the Hessville Post Office, Hammond, Indiana, in memory of the late Fred W. Dedelow.
